content: free pattern is also available on my instagram @willow andwild included in the digital download is the crochet pattern for pika the electric mouse snuggler written in us terms this snuggler is perfect for little or big hands to love this crochet pattern works up quickly and is perfect for market makes the finished snuggler will measure approx 12 the pattern is for beginner to intermediate crocheters many pictures are included to help you through the project i d love to see how your pika turns out don t forget to tag willow&wild with your finished photos **copyright this pattern is intended for personal use only all contents of this document are property of willow&wild contents will not be sold distributed or transferred to any other person handmade items produced from this pattern require that credit for the design is given to willow&wild copyright 2024
